titles.title: A bill to transfer the Colonial Court House in York, Pennsylvania, to the control of the National Park Service.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests
committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: 3/29/1988--Introduced. Authorizes the transfer of the Colonial Court House of York, Pennsylvania, a national historic site, to the National Park Service. Authorizes appropriations.
